Nonzero if a request has been made to forcibly unmount, else 0.

# vfs_isforce

**Function**

Determine if a forced unmount is in progress.

## Declaration

```swift
int vfs_isforce(mount_t mp);
```

## Parameters

- **mp**: Mount to test.

## Return Value

Nonzero if a request has been made to forcibly unmount, else 0.

## Discussion

A forced unmount invalidates open files.
title: vfs_isforce
